duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform installations and changes of broadband service, ensuring adherence to guidelines and safe work practices for a positive customer experience.
Address customer inquiries and concerns, troubleshoot and problem-solve to ensure proper product and service functionality.
Communicate and engage with customers to educate them on products and services, and persist in providing a positive customer experience.
Utilize installation tools and hand tools to perform tasks, including working at heights and in confined spaces.
Maintain proper equipment and drive company vehicle in a safe and responsible manner while working in varying weather conditions.
Complete required training, certifications, and safety requirements for continued employment.
Work weekends and overtime as necessary, and perform other assigned duties as needed.
